definitions.title: vb.

answer, respond to sthg. said, actual or implied, Ju Jdg 8:8, 1Sa 4:20, Job 9:15 +; esp.

definitions.body: of men, c. acc. pers. Ge 45:3 (E), Ju Jdg 5:29, 2Ki 18:36 = Is 36:21, Job 5:1 + very oft. (c. 110 t.); specif. be responsive, i.e. answer kindly, grant request 1Ki 12:7 (sf. pers.); = be amenable, docile (toward ´[[י]]) Ho 2:17 (of Isr. in fig.); seldom and late, c. acc. of thing replied to, Job 32:12, Job 33:13 (De Di Bu), Job 40:2.

definitions.title: b.

definitions.title: 2. a.

definitions.body: Pt. [[מַעֲנֶה בְּשִׂמְחַת לִבּוֹ]] Ec 5:19, wholly dub.; Hi (God) causes (all things) to respond in the joy of his heart;  De answers to the joy,  etc.; de Jong Wild occupies him (II. [[עָנׇה]]) with the joy, etc.
